{{html:

<script src="/$$space/.files/lib/angular-1.2.0/angular.min.js"></script>
<div ng-app="cloudscalers" ng-controller="AuthenticatedSessionController">
<div class="subnavbar" ng-controller="CloudSpaceNavigatorController">

    <div class="subnavbar-inner">
        <div class="container">
            <a class="brand" href="../$$space">CloudScalers</a>
            <ul class="pull-right">
                <li><a href="../$$space/Settings" ng-cloak>{[currentUser.username]}</a> </li>
                <li>
                    <a ng-click="logout()" href="" >
                        <i class="icon-lock"></i>
                        <span>Logout</span>
                    </a>
                </li>
            </ul>
        </div>
    </div>

    <div class="subnavbar-inner">
        <div class="container">
            <ul>
                <li><a href="../$$space"> <i class="icon-home"></i></a></li>
                <li class="dropdown">
                    
                    <a href="#" class="cloudspaceCollapse dropdown-toggle" ng-click="isCollapsed = !isCollapsed"><span ng-cloak>Account / {[currentSpace.name]}</span> <b class="caret"></b></a>
                    <div persistent-dropdown ng-cloak>
                        <accordion close-others="false">
                            <accordion-group heading="{[account.name]}" ng-repeat="account in AccountCloudSpaceHierarchy">
                                <ul>
                                    <li ng-repeat="space in account.cloudspaces">
                                        <a href="#" ng-click="setCurrentCloudspace(space)">{[space.name]}</a>
                                    </li>
                                </ul>
                            </accordion-group>
                        </accordion>
                    </div>
                    
                </li>
                <li>
                    <a href="../$$space/MachineBuckets"> <i class="icon-cloud"></i>
                        <span>Machine Buckets</span>
                    </a>
                </li>
                <li>
                    <a href="../$$space/DesktopBuckets"> <i class="icon-desktop"></i>
                        <span>Desktop Buckets</span>
                    </a>
                </li>
                <li>
                    <a href="../$$space/StorageBuckets">
                        <i class="icon-hdd"></i>
                        <span>Storage Buckets</span>
                    </a>
                </li>

            </ul>
            <ul class="pull-right">
                <li>
                    <a href="../$$space/FAQ">
                        <i class="icon-ambulance"></i>
                        <span>Docs</span>
                    </a>
                </li>
                <li class="dropdown">
                    <a href="../$$space/Settings" data-toggle="dropdown">
                        <i class="icon-cog"></i>
                        <span>
                            Settings
                            <i class=caret></i>
                        </span>
                    </a>
                    <ul class="dropdown-menu">
                        <li>
                            <a href="AccountSettings">Account</a>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                            <a href="CloudSpaceSettings">CloudSpace</a>
                        </li>
                    </ul>
                </li>
            </ul>
        </div>
    </div>
    

</div>

<div class="main">
	
	<div class="main-inner">

	    <div class="container">
		<div class="row">
		}}
